comment: Renting from ~Scoots~ was the highlight of our trip to Cozumel. The staff was friendly, and the scooter was so much fun to ride!
author: Sarah

comment: We had an amazing experience with ~Scoots~. The scooters were in great condition, and the rental process was smooth.
author: John
